caption.title: Non-human primate (NHP) carcasses collected and tested for yellow fever virus (YFV) RNA, according to the mesoregions of Minas Gerais state, Brazil.
caption.p: YFV: yellow fever virus. RT-qPCR: one-step real-time polymerase chain reaction. NHP: non-human primate. Liver samples of NHP carcasses collected in Minas Gerais state, Brazil (January 2017â€“December 2018), were tested for YFV RNA using the RT-qPCR [ 24]. (+) detection of YFV RNA by RT-qPCR. (-) non-detection of YFV RNA by RT-qPCR.
